metadata.name: Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster
metadata.description:
This module deploys a Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster.

**Note:** This module is not intended for broad, generic use, as it was designed to cater for the requirements of the AZD CLI product. Feature requests and bug fix requests are welcome if they support the development of the AZD CLI but may not be incorporated if they aim to make this module more generic than what it needs to be for its primary use case.
Optional. The name of diagnostic setting.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set the specific logs to collect here.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category group for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `allLogs` to collect all logs.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable log collection.
Required. Name of a Diagnostic Metric category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `AllMetrics` to collect all metrics.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed. "allMetrics" includes all possible metrics for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable metric collection.
Optional. A string indicating whether the export to Log Analytics should use the default destination type, i.e. AzureDiagnostics, or use a destination type.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic log analytics workspace. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.

Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. The full ARM resource ID of the Marketplace resource to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.
The name of the created firewall rule.
The resource ID of the created firewall rule.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. The name of the custom firewall rule.
Required. The starting IP address for the custom firewall rule.
Required. The ending IP address for the custom firewall rule.
Optional. List of custom firewall rules.
Required. Indicates whether to allow all IP addresses.
Required. Indicates whether to allow all Azure internal IP addresses.
Optional. The name of the private endpoint.
Optional. The location to deploy the private endpoint to.
Optional. The name of the private link connection to create.
Optional. The subresource to deploy the private endpoint for. For example "vault", "mysqlServer" or "dataFactory".
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Optional. The name of the Private DNS Zone Group.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Required. The private DNS zone groups to associate the private endpoint. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. The private DNS zone group to configure for the private endpoint.
Optional. If Manual Private Link Connection is required.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with the manual connection request.
Optional. FQDN that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
Required. A list of private ip addresses of the private endpoint.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.
Required. The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group.
Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. The member name of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. A private ip address obtained from the private endpoint's subnet.
Required. Properties of private endpoint IP configurations.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the private endpoint. This will be used to map to the First Party Service endpoints.
Optional. Application security groups in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the private endpoint.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/resource groups in this deployment.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Specify if you want to deploy the Private Endpoint into a different resource group than the main resource.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. The resource ID of the key vault where to store the secrets of this module.
Optional. The name to use when creating the primary write connection string secret.
An exported secret's references.
The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
Required. Name of the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster.
Optional. Default to current resource group scope location. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the Database Account resource.
Required. Username for admin user.
Required. Password for admin user.
Optional. Mode to create the azure cosmos db mongodb vCore cluster.
Optional. The diagnostic settings of the service.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Whether high availability is enabled on the node group.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. IP addresses to allow access to the cluster from.
Required. Number of nodes in the node group.
Optional. Deployed Node type in the node group.
Optional. Configuration details for private endpoints. For security reasons, it is recommended to use private endpoints whenever possible.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Key vault reference and secret settings for the module's secrets export.
Required. SKU defines the CPU and memory that is provisioned for each node.
Required. Disk storage size for the node group in GB.

variables.firewallRules: [union(map(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'customRules'), createArray()), lambda('customRule', createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(lambdaVariables('customRule'), 'firewallRuleName'), format('allow-{0}-to-{1}', replace(lambdaVariables('customRule').startIpAddress, '.', ''), replace(lambdaVariables('customRule').endIpAddress, '.', ''))), 'startIpAddress', lambdaVariables('customRule').startIpAddress, 'endIpAddress', lambdaVariables('customRule').endIpAddress))), if(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'allowAllIPs'), false()), createArray(createObject('name', 'allow-all-IPs', 'startIpAddress', '0.0.0.0', 'endIpAddress', '255.255.255.255')), createArray()), if(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('networkAcls'), 'allowAzureIPs'), false()), createArray(createObject('name', 'allow-all-azure-internal-IPs', 'startIpAddress', '0.0.0.0', 'endIpAddress', '0.0.0.0')), createArray()))]

metadata.name: Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore Cluster Config FireWall Rules
metadata.description: This module config firewall rules for the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster.
Conditional. The name of the parent Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the firewall rule.
Required. The start IP address of the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.
Required. The end IP address of the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.
The name of the resource group the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB vCore cluster was created in.
The name of the firewall rule.
The resource ID of the firewall rule.
The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
Required. The name of the secret to set.
Required. The value of the secret to set.
Required. The name of the Key Vault to set the secrets in.
Required. The secrets to set in the Key Vault.
The references to the secrets exported to the provided Key Vault.

parameters.privateLinkServiceConnections: [if(not(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true())), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/mongoClusters', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'mongoCluster'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/mongoClusters', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'mongoCluster')))))), createObject('value', null()))]
parameters.manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections: [if(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true()), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/mongoClusters', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'mongoCluster'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/mongoClusters', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'mongoCluster')), 'requestMessage', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'manualConnectionRequestMessage'), 'Manual approval required.'))))), createObject('value', null()))]

metadata.name: Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Groups
